item.title: Over 5.2 million pools sold across US, Canada under recall after reports of 9 deaths
item.description: More than 5.2 million aboveground swimming pools sold in the U.S. and Canada since 2002 are being recalled

item.title: 5 years after Ohio's $60M bribery scandal, critics say more could be done to prevent a repeat
item.description: It has been five years since a $60 million bribery scheme funded by FirstEnergy Corp. came to light in Ohio with the stunning arrests ofa powerful Rep...

item.title: Ford Foundation's outgoing president joins the board of Obama Foundation
item.description: Darren Walker, outgoing president of the Ford Foundation, is joining The Obama Foundation’s board of directors on November 1

item.title: FDA names former pharmaceutical company executive to oversee US drug program
item.description: The Food and Drug Administration named a longtime pharmaceutical executive to run the agency’s drug program

item.title: Companies pledge to invest more than $700 billion in Germany over the next 3 years
item.description: A group of dozens of companies is pledging to invest at least 631 billion euros ($733 billion) in Germany over the next three years
